content:
MediaPermissionImage Enum

Definition

Specifies the permission level for images.

In this Article

public enum MediaPermissionImage
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
MediaPermissionImage

Examples

The following code example shows the use of the Image property. 

<MediaPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.Demand, Image:=MediaPermissionImage.AllImage)>
Public Sub Method05()
End Sub

[MediaPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.Demand, Image = MediaPermissionImage.AllImage)]

Remarks

Use this enumeration to set the Image property of the MediaPermission class. The default is SafeImage.

Fields

AllImage

Permission that allows unrestricted image display.
NoImage

Permission that denies all images to be displayed.
SafeImage

Permission that allows safe, limited image display, which includes denying stream access to the image file.
SiteOfOriginImage

Permission that only allows display of images that are located at the application's site of origin.
